GeneDef.label: marine corps genome (marine)
GeneDef.description: This archite gene rewrites the subject's physiology and psychology to match the Marine Corps "Marine" profile. Carriers gain the Marine trait, becoming terrifying frontline badasses.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Applies all bonuses of the Marine trait through genetic engineering.

GeneDef.label: marine corps genome (corpsman)
GeneDef.description: This archite gene rewires the subject to match the Marine Corps "Corpsman" profile. Carriers gain the Corpsman variant of the Marines trait, excelling at battlefield medicine.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Applies all bonuses of the Corpsman trait through genetic engineering.

GeneDef.label: war hero genome
GeneDef.description: An archite super-soldier genome. Carriers gain the War Hero trait, becoming nearly unkillable juggernauts capable of reshaping the battlefield single-handedly.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Applies all bonuses of the War Hero trait through genetic engineering.
Overwrites prior Marine/Corpsman conditioning and perfects all skills.
